com.saltedge.connector.sdk.provider.models

Class AuthorizationType

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.saltedge.connector.sdk.provider.models.AuthorizationType

  • public class AuthorizationType
extends java.lang.Object
    Unique Authorization Type which corresponds to data registered in `Dashboard/Settings/Authorization types` for Customer. (https://priora.saltedge.com/providers/settings#authorization_types)

      registered human readable name of authorization type (e.g.
      InputField[] primaryAuthFields
      collection of primary credentials input fields

      • isInteractive

        public boolean isInteractive()
        Check if Authorization Type is Interactive (has MFA input fields)
        Returns:
        true if interactiveFields list is not empty

      • getInteractiveFieldCode

        Returns code of the first interactive input field
        Returns:
